              "newvalue": "",
              "warehouse_name": "{{ selectedItem[0].warehouse }}",
              "current_qty": "{{ selectedItem[0].current_qty }}",
              "iconImage": "{{ selectedItem[0].image}}",
              "titleText": "{{ selectedItem[0].item_name}}",
              "subTitleText": "{{ selectedItem[0].item_code}}",
              "isOpen": "{{ isEditDialogOpen }}",
              "newQty": "{{ newQuantity }}"
            },
            "componentSlots": {},
            "componentEvents": {
              "blur": {
                "event": "blur",
                "action": "Run Script",
                "script": "// In the \"Run Script\" action for the \"document-created\" event\nconst { doctype, docname } = event.detail;\n\nfrappe.call({\n  method: \"wms.api.api.submitDoc\", // Make sure this path is correct!\n  args: {\n    doctype: doctype,\n    docname: docname\n  },\n  callback: function(response) {\n    if (response.message) {\n      // ✅ Use the new method from the documentation!\n      studio.showToast({\n        message: response.message,\n        type: \"success\" \n      });\n      // You can also close your dialog here if needed\n      // isEditDialogOpen.value = false;\n    }\n  },\n  error: function(err) {\n    // Also handle errors with a toast\n    studio.showToast({\n        title: \"Submission Failed\",\n        message: err.message,\n        type: \"error\"\n      });\n  }\n});"
              }
            },
            "blockName": "customdialouge",
            "children": [],
            "baseStyles": {
              "display": "flex",
              "flexDirection": "row",
              "justifyContent": "center",
              "alignItems": "center"
            },
            "rawStyles": {},
            "mobileStyles": {},
            "tabletStyles": {},
            "visibilityCondition": "",
            "classes": [
              "\"shadow-xl\"",
              "\"transition-all\"",
              "\"duration-300\"",
              "\"ease-in-out\"",
              "\"{{ inputs.isOpen ? 'opacity-100 scale-100' : 'opacity-0 scale-95' }}\""
            ],
            "isStudioComponent": true
          }
        ],
        "baseStyles": {
          "display": "flex",
          "flexDirection": "column",
          "flexShrink": 0,
          "height": "fit-content",
          "width": "100%",
          "justifyContent": "center",

        },
        "rawStyles": {},
        "mobileStyles": {},
        "tabletStyles": {},
        "visibilityCondition": "isEditDialogOpen",
        "originalElement": "div",
        "classes": [
          "\"transition-opacity\"",
          "\"duration-300\"",
          "\"ease-in-out\"",
          "\"{{ inputs.isOpen ? 'opacity-100' : 'opacity-0 pointer-events-none' }}\""
        ]
      },

                      {
                        "componentId": "Button-i7z968oc9",
                        "componentName": "Button",
                        "componentProps": {
                          "label": "View More",
                          "variant": "subtle",
                          "theme": "gray",
                          "size": "sm"
                        },
                        "componentSlots": {},
                        "componentEvents": {
                          "click": {
                            "event": "click",
                            "action": "Run Script",
                            "script": "const loadMoreStockReconciliations = () => {\n    // Safety check to ensure the full data source exists and is an array\n    if (!Array.isArray(stockReco.data) || !stockReco.data.length) {\n        console.error(\"Source data (stockReco.data) is not available to load more items.\");\n        return;\n    }\n\n    const currentCount = stockRecoShort.value.length;\n    const totalCount = stockReco.data.length;\n\n    // Determine the next batch of items to load from the full dataset\n    const nextItems = stockReco.data.slice(currentCount, currentCount + 4);\n\n    // If there are new items, append them to the displayed list\n    if (nextItems.length > 0) {\n        stockRecoShort.value.push(...nextItems);\n\n        // Recalculate and update the remaining count\n        const newRemainingCount = totalCount - stockRecoShort.value.length;\n        if (typeof remainingStockRecoCount !== 'undefined') {\n            remainingStockRecoCount.value = newRemainingCount > 0 ? newRemainingCount : 0;\n        }\n\n        console.log(`Loaded ${nextItems.length} more items. Now showing ${stockRecoShort.value.length} of ${totalCount}.`);\n    } else {\n        // This message will appear when the end of the list is reached\n        console.log(\"No more items to load.\");\n    }\n};\n"
                          }
                        },
                        "blockName": "Button",
                        "children": [],
                        "baseStyles": {
                          "width": "100px",
                          "marginTop": "30px",
                          "marginBottom": "30px",
                          "marginLeft": "0px",
                          "marginRight": "0px"
                        },
                        "rawStyles": {},
                        "mobileStyles": {},
                        "tabletStyles": {},
                        "visibilityCondition": "remainingStockRecotoBeShown > 0",
                        "classes": []
                      }
                    ],
                    "baseStyles": {

                      "flexDirection": "column",
                      "position": "static",
                      "height": "100%",

                      "paddingRight": "20px",

                  }
                ],

                      {
                        "componentId": "Button-i7z968oc9",
                        "componentName": "Button",
                        "componentProps": {
                          "label": "View More",
                          "variant": "subtle",
                          "theme": "gray",
                          "size": "sm"
                        },
                        "componentSlots": {},
                        "componentEvents": {
                          "click": {
                            "event": "click",
                            "action": "Run Script",
                            "script": "const loadMoreStockReconciliations = () => {\n    // Safety check to ensure the full data source exists and is an array\n    if (!Array.isArray(stockReco.data) || !stockReco.data.length) {\n        console.error(\"Source data (stockReco.data) is not available to load more items.\");\n        return;\n    }\n\n    const currentCount = stockRecoShort.value.length;\n    const totalCount = stockReco.data.length;\n\n    // Determine the next batch of items to load from the full dataset\n    const nextItems = stockReco.data.slice(currentCount, currentCount + 4);\n\n    // If there are new items, append them to the displayed list\n    if (nextItems.length > 0) {\n        stockRecoShort.value.push(...nextItems);\n\n        // Recalculate and update the remaining count\n        const newRemainingCount = totalCount - stockRecoShort.value.length;\n        if (typeof remainingStockRecoCount !== 'undefined') {\n            remainingStockRecoCount.value = newRemainingCount > 0 ? newRemainingCount : 0;\n        }\n\n        console.log(`Loaded ${nextItems.length} more items. Now showing ${stockRecoShort.value.length} of ${totalCount}.`);\n    } else {\n        // This message will appear when the end of the list is reached\n        console.log(\"No more items to load.\");\n    }\n};\n"
                          }
                        },
                        "blockName": "Button",
                        "children": [],
                        "baseStyles": {
                          "width": "100px",
                          "marginTop": "30px",
                          "marginBottom": "30px",
                          "marginLeft": "0px",
                          "marginRight": "0px"
                        },
                        "rawStyles": {},
                        "mobileStyles": {},
                        "tabletStyles": {},
                        "visibilityCondition": "remainingStockRecotoBeShown > 0",
                        "classes": []
